ygData.msgSnippet: ((With my lucky by the time this arrives my mail will fix itself and send the First one.)) ... Koj slides behind Inu standing back to back Inu duck As Koj

((With my lucky by the time this arrives my mail will fix itself and send 
the First one.))

::Koj::
Koj slides behind Inu standing back to back "Inu duck" As Koj Drops to his 
knees.

::Inu::
Inu lowers his head as WarMachine's missile flys over both of them "Whats 
the plan?" As Bloodstrikes blast hits Inu in the chest as it burns Inu 
getting alittle pissed.

::Koj::
Koj sees the 8 shots coming towards him looks down at a stasis pod door. Koj 
Kicks the door up into the air and grabs it to use as a shield as the 7 
shots ding the shield. Koj peeks out "I though there were 8" As the 8 shot 
hits him cracking his chest plate. "I'm work on it.There trying to use 
numbers and swarm in on us."

::Inu::
"Not to rush you but work faster." "Inu-Yasha Terrorize!" Inu-yasha 
transforms into a larger dragon. ((Looks like Bahamut)) as he locks on
BloodStrike and Warmachine and fires his plasma breath.  Grabs his Plasma 
rifle as fires 2 blast at Zardus.

::Koj::
As Koj ducks behind the door as 25 more shots pelt it.Koj looks at the sand 
"Use your wing to create a sand storm the can't hit what they can't scan."

::Neo Bahamut::
"So be it" As Neo starts to flap his wing kicking up alot of sand towards 
Zardus and Co.. As wind and sand start to get stronger it begins to wear and 
pick larger rocks sending them at Zardus and Co.

::Koj::
Koj looks at the 15 lighting bolts and smiles as he quickly snaps the Fang 
to gather and starts to spin it pulling in all lighting feeding the fang. As 
the Fang use some of the enegry to close the crack in Koj's chest and start 
his Intense Alteration Systems. Koj fires 3 exploding pellets at Treadshot 
and Hurricane. As Koj spins the lance in reverse sending 13 lighting bolts 
at Inzolas and Stranato.
